title.NoSidewalk: Should there be a No Sidewalk label here?

CurbRamp.title: Correct Curb Ramp
CurbRamp.example-1-to-4: This label is correctly placed at the bottom of a curb ramp

NoCurbRamp.title: Correct Missing Curb Ramp
NoCurbRamp.example-1-to-3: This intersection is lacking a curb ramp
NoCurbRamp.example-4: This crosswalk indicates there should be a curb ramp here

Obstacle.title: Correct Obstacle
Obstacle.example-1: These construction cones are blocking a pedestrian crosswalk
Obstacle.example-2: This tree blocks the entire sidewalk
Obstacle.example-3: This pole blocks the sidewalk and a curb ramp entrance
Obstacle.example-4: This fire hydrant blocks the sidewalk

SurfaceProblem.title: Correct Surface Problem
SurfaceProblem.example-2: Brick sidewalks are bumpy and can be difficult to pass
SurfaceProblem.example-4: There is a lot of grass growing between the sidewalk cracks

NoSidewalk.title: Correct No Sidewalk
NoSidewalk.example-1-to-2: This is an abruptly ending sidewalk

CurbRamp.title: Incorrect Curb Ramp
CurbRamp.example-1-to-2: Sidewalk to driveway transitions are not curb ramps

NoCurbRamp.title: Incorrect Missing Curb Ramp
NoCurbRamp.example-1: Residential walkways should not be labeled as a missing curb ramp
NoCurbRamp.example-2-and-4: This is not located on a pedestrian path
NoCurbRamp.example-3: This is not an intersection pedestrians should cross at

Obstacle.title: Incorrect Obstacle
Obstacle.example-1: There is enough space to comfortably maneuver around this pole
Obstacle.example-2: This pole located between, but not on these curb ramps
Obstacle.example-3: This tree is not on the pedestrian path
Obstacle.example-4: There is enough space to comfortably maneuver around this lid

SurfaceProblem.title: Incorrect Surface Problem
SurfaceProblem.example-1: Surface problems on curb ramps should be marked with a curb ramp label with a higher severity
SurfaceProblem.example-2: This gravel is not on the pedestrian path
SurfaceProblem.example-3: This grass is not on the pedestrian path
SurfaceProblem.example-4: Normal sidewalk tiles are not surface problems

NoSidewalk.title: Incorrect No Sidewalk
NoSidewalk.example-1: Narrow sidewalks should not be labeled as no sidewalk
NoSidewalk.example-2: Driveways should not be labeled as no sidewalk
NoSidewalk.example-3: Traffic medians should not be labeled as no sidewalk
NoSidewalk.example-4: Alleyways and side streets should not be labeled as no sidewalk

mission-start.title: Validate {{n}} {{label_type}} labels
mission-start.body: Your mission is to determine the correctness of __LABELCOUNT_PLACEHOLDER__ __LABELTYPE_PLACEHOLDER__ labels placed by other users!

mission-complete.title: Great Job!
mission-complete.body-1: You just validated {{n}} Curb Ramp labels.
mission-complete.body-2: You just validated {{n}} Missing Curb Ramp labels.
mission-complete.body-4: You just validated {{n}} Surface Problem labels.
mission-complete.body-7: You just validated {{n}} No Sidewalk labels.
mission-complete.no-new-mission-body: Click the button to start exploring

mobile.info-title-NoCurbRamp: What is a Missing Curb Ramp?
